/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, creating a serene backdrop for the bustling city below. The road itself is gray, marked with white lines that guide the flow of traffic. Streetlights stand sentinel along the sides of the road, ready to illuminate the area as dusk falls. In the distance, buildings rise, their windows reflecting the sunlight, hinting at the life and activity within. The image captures a typical day in Beijing, where nature and urban life coexist harmoniously.
